Sql.query: insert into vce_datcalculo( crdcgcmarr_dol, crdcgcmarr_sol, crdcgccbefparrampa, crdcgccbefpar, crdcgccbefarrtoma, crdcgccbefarr, crdcgpotmin, crdcgconcompp4, crdcgpotpar4, crdcgconcompp3, crdcgpotpar3, crdcgconcompp2, crdcgpotpar2, crdcgconcompp1, crdcgpotpar1, crdcgccpotefe, crdcgpotefe, crdcgnumarrpar, crdcgprecioaplicunid, crdcgprecioaplic, crdcgprecombunid, crdcgprecomb, crdcgcvncsol, crdcgcvncdol, crdcgtratquim, crdcgtratmec, crdcgtranspor, crdcglhv, crdcgtipcom, crdcgfecmod, grupocodi, pecacodi, crdcgdiasfinanc, crdcgtiempo, crdcgenergia, crdcgconsiderapotnom, barrcodi ) values( :crdcgcmarr_dol, :crdcgcmarr_sol, :crdcgccbefparrampa, :crdcgccbefpar, :crdcgccbefarrtoma, :crdcgccbefarr, :crdcgpotmin, :crdcgconcompp4, :crdcgpotpar4, :crdcgconcompp3, :crdcgpotpar3, :crdcgconcompp2, :crdcgpotpar2, :crdcgconcompp1, :crdcgpotpar1, :crdcgccpotefe, :crdcgpotefe, :crdcgnumarrpar, :crdcgprecioaplicunid, :crdcgprecioaplic, :crdcgprecombunid, :crdcgprecomb, :crdcgcvncsol, :crdcgcvncdol, :crdcgtratquim, :crdcgtratmec, :crdcgtranspor, :crdcglhv, :crdcgtipcom, :crdcgfecmod, :grupocodi, :pecacodi, :crdcgdiasfinanc, :crdcgtiempo, :crdcgenergia, :crdcgconsiderapotnom, :barrcodi )

update vce_datcalculo set crdcgcmarr_dol = :crdcgcmarr_dol, crdcgcmarr_sol = :crdcgcmarr_sol, crdcgccbefparrampa = :crdcgccbefparrampa, crdcgccbefpar = :crdcgccbefpar, crdcgccbefarrtoma = :crdcgccbefarrtoma, crdcgccbefarr = :crdcgccbefarr, crdcgpotmin = :crdcgpotmin, crdcgconcompp4 = :crdcgconcompp4, crdcgpotpar4 = :crdcgpotpar4, crdcgconcompp3 = :crdcgconcompp3, crdcgpotpar3 = :crdcgpotpar3, crdcgconcompp2 = :crdcgconcompp2, crdcgpotpar2 = :crdcgpotpar2, crdcgconcompp1 = :crdcgconcompp1, crdcgpotpar1 = :crdcgpotpar1, crdcgccpotefe = :crdcgccpotefe, crdcgpotefe = :crdcgpotefe, crdcgnumarrpar = :crdcgnumarrpar, crdcgprecioaplicunid = :crdcgprecioaplicunid, crdcgprecioaplic = :crdcgprecioaplic, crdcgprecombunid = :crdcgprecombunid, crdcgprecomb = :crdcgprecomb, crdcgcvncsol = :crdcgcvncsol, crdcgcvncdol = :crdcgcvncdol, crdcgtratquim = :crdcgtratquim, crdcgtratmec = :crdcgtratmec, crdcgtranspor = :crdcgtranspor, crdcglhv = :crdcglhv, crdcgtipcom = :crdcgtipcom, crdcgdiasfinanc = :crdcgdiasfinanc, crdcgtiempo = :crdcgtiempo, crdcgenergia = :crdcgenergia, crdcgconsiderapotnom = :crdcgconsiderapotnom, barrcodi = :barrcodi, crdcgconspotefearr = :crdcgconspotefearr, crdcgconspotefepar = :crdcgconspotefepar, crdcgprecioaplicxarr = :crdcgprecioaplicxarr, crdcgprecioaplicxpar = :crdcgprecioaplicxpar, crdcgprecioaplicxincgen = :crdcgprecioaplicxincgen, crdcgprecioaplicxdisgen = :crdcgprecioaplicxdisgen where crdcgfecmod = :crdcgfecmod and grupocodi = :grupocodi and pecacodi = :pecacodi
delete from vce_datcalculo where crdcgfecmod = :crdcgfecmod and grupocodi = :grupocodi and pecacodi = :pecacodi

select crdcgcmarr_dol, crdcgcmarr_sol, crdcgccbefparrampa, crdcgccbefpar, crdcgccbefarrtoma, crdcgccbefarr, crdcgpotmin, crdcgconcompp4, crdcgpotpar4, crdcgconcompp3, crdcgpotpar3, crdcgconcompp2, crdcgpotpar2, crdcgconcompp1, crdcgpotpar1, crdcgccpotefe, crdcgpotefe, crdcgnumarrpar, crdcgprecioaplicunid, crdcgprecioaplic, crdcgprecombunid, crdcgprecomb, crdcgcvncsol, crdcgcvncdol, crdcgtratquim, crdcgtratmec, crdcgtranspor, crdcglhv, crdcgtipcom, crdcgfecmod, grupocodi, pecacodi, crdcgdiasfinanc, crdcgtiempo, crdcgenergia, crdcgconsiderapotnom, barrcodi from vce_datcalculo where crdcgfecmod = :crdcgfecmod and grupocodi = :grupocodi and pecacodi = :pecacodi

select crdcgcmarr_dol, crdcgcmarr_sol, crdcgccbefparrampa, crdcgccbefpar, crdcgccbefarrtoma, crdcgccbefarr, crdcgpotmin, crdcgconcompp4, crdcgpotpar4, crdcgconcompp3, crdcgpotpar3, crdcgconcompp2, crdcgpotpar2, crdcgconcompp1, crdcgpotpar1, crdcgccpotefe, crdcgpotefe, crdcgnumarrpar, crdcgprecioaplicunid, crdcgprecioaplic, crdcgprecombunid, crdcgprecomb, crdcgcvncsol, crdcgcvncdol, crdcgtratquim, crdcgtratmec, crdcgtranspor, crdcglhv, crdcgtipcom, crdcgfecmod, grupocodi, pecacodi, crdcgdiasfinanc, crdcgtiempo, crdcgenergia, crdcgconsiderapotnom, barrcodi from vce_datcalculo

select crdcgcmarr_dol, crdcgcmarr_sol, crdcgccbefparrampa, crdcgccbefpar, crdcgccbefarrtoma, crdcgccbefarr, crdcgpotmin, crdcgconcompp4, crdcgpotpar4, crdcgconcompp3, crdcgpotpar3, crdcgconcompp2, crdcgpotpar2, crdcgconcompp1, crdcgpotpar1, crdcgccpotefe, crdcgpotefe, crdcgnumarrpar, crdcgprecioaplicunid, crdcgprecioaplic, crdcgprecombunid, crdcgprecomb, crdcgcvncsol, crdcgcvncdol, crdcgtratquim, crdcgtratmec, crdcgtranspor, crdcglhv, crdcgtipcom, crdcgfecmod, grupocodi, pecacodi, crdcgdiasfinanc, crdcgtiempo, crdcgenergia, crdcgconsiderapotnom, barrcodi from vce_datcalculo

SELECT DC.pecacodi AS pecacodi ,DC.GRUPOCODI AS GRUPOCODI ,TRIM(MO.GRUPONOMB) AS GRUPONOMB ,FE.FENERGNOMB AS FENERGNOMB ,DC.CRDCGTIPCOM AS CRDCGTIPCOM ,CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(DC.CRDCGFECMOD,'DD')='01' THEN BA.BARRBARRATRANSFERENCIA ELSE TO_CHAR(DC.CRDCGFECMOD,'DD') END AS BARRADIAPER ,CASE DC.CRDCGCONSIDERAPOTNOM WHEN 1 THEN 'Si' END AS CONSIDERARPOTNOMINAL ,DC.CRDCGLHV AS CRDCGLHV ,DC.CRDCGTRANSPOR AS CRDCGTRANSPOR ,DC.CRDCGTRATMEC AS CRDCGTRATMEC ,DC.CRDCGTRATQUIM AS CRDCGTRATQUIM ,DC.CRDCGDIASFINANC AS CRDCGDIASFINANC ,DC.CRDCGCVNCDOL AS CRDCGCVNCDOL ,DC.CRDCGCVNCSOL AS CRDCGCVNCSOL ,DC.CRDCGPRECOMB AS CRDCGPRECOMB ,DC.CRDCGPRECOMBUNID AS CRDCGPRECOMBUNID ,DC.CRDCGENERGIA AS VCEDCMENERGIA ,DC.CRDCGTIEMPO AS VCEDCMTIEMPO ,DC.CRDCGNUMARRPAR AS CRDCGNUMARRPAR ,DC.CRDCGPOTEFE AS CRDCGPOTEFE ,DC.CRDCGCCPOTEFE AS CRDCGCCPOTEFE ,DC.CRDCGPOTPAR1 AS CRDCGPOTPAR1 ,DC.CRDCGCONCOMPP1 AS CRDCGCONCOMPP1 ,DC.CRDCGPOTPAR2 AS CRDCGPOTPAR2 ,DC.CRDCGCONCOMPP2 AS CRDCGCONCOMPP2 ,DC.CRDCGPOTPAR3 AS CRDCGPOTPAR3 ,DC.CRDCGCONCOMPP3 AS CRDCGCONCOMPP3 ,DC.CRDCGPOTPAR4 AS CRDCGPOTPAR4 ,DC.CRDCGCONCOMPP4 AS CRDCGCONCOMPP4 ,DC.CRDCGPOTMIN AS CRDCGPOTMIN ,CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(DC.CRDCGFECMOD,'DD')='01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS EDIT ,(CASE WHEN EQ.EMPRCODI IS NULL THEN '_NO DEFINIDO' ELSE EMP.EMPRNOMB END) AS EMPRNOMB FROM VCE_DATCALCULO DC JOIN PR_GRUPO MO ON DC.GRUPOCODI = MO.GRUPOCODI -- MODO OPERACION JOIN PR_GRUPO GG ON MO.GRUPOPADRE = GG.GRUPOCODI -- GRUPO LEFT JOIN (SELECT GRUPOCODI, EMPRCODI, MAX(EQUIPADRE) EQUIPADRE FROM EQ_EQUIPO WHERE FAMCODI IN (2,3) AND NVL(GRUPOCODI,-1) != -1 AND EQUIESTADO = 'A' GROUP BY GRUPOCODI, EMPRCODI UNION SELECT GRUPOCODI, EMPRCODI, MAX(EQUIPADRE) EQUIPADRE FROM EQ_EQUIPO WHERE FAMCODI IN (2,3) AND NVL(GRUPOCODI,-1) != -1 AND EQUIESTADO = 'B' AND GRUPOCODI NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT GRUPOCODI FROM EQ_EQUIPO WHERE FAMCODI IN (2,3) AND NVL(GRUPOCODI,-1) != -1 AND EQUIESTADO = 'A' ) GROUP BY GRUPOCODI, EMPRCODI )EQ ON MO.GRUPOPADRE = EQ.GRUPOCODI LEFT JOIN EQ_EQUIPO CG ON EQ.EQUIPADRE = CG.EQUICODI -- CENTRAL LEFT JOIN SI_FUENTEENERGIA FE ON MO.FENERGCODI = FE.FENERGCODI LEFT JOIN TRN_BARRA BA ON DC.BARRCODI = BA.BARRCODI LEFT JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMP ON EQ.EMPRCODI = EMP.EMPRCODI WHERE {0} ORDER BY MO.GRUPONOMB,DC.CRDCGFECMOD

SELECT DC.pecacodi AS pecacodi ,DC.BARRCODI AS BARRCODI ,NVL(DC.VCEDCMCONSIDERAPOTNOM,' ') AS CONSIDERARPOTNOMINAL ,DC.VCEDCMENERGIA AS VCEDCMENERGIA ,DC.VCEDCMTIEMPO AS VCEDCMTIEMPO ,TRIM(GR.GRUPONOMB) AS GRUPONOMB ,PE.PERIANIOMES || ' ' || PE.RECANOMBRE AS PERIODO FROM VCE_DATCALCULOMAN DC JOIN VCE_PERIODO_CALCULO PC ON DC.PECACODI = PC.PECACODI LEFT JOIN TRN_PERIODO PE ON PC.PERICODI = PE.PERICODI LEFT JOIN PR_GRUPO GR ON DC.GRUPOCODI = GR.GRUPOCODI WHERE DC.pecacodi = {0} AND DC.GRUPOCODI = {1}

UPDATE VCE_DATCALCULOMAN SET BARRCODI = :barrcodi ,VCEDCMCONSIDERAPOTNOM = :vcedcmconsiderapotnom ,VCEDCMENERGIA = :vcedcmenergia ,VCEDCMTIEMPO = :vcedcmtiempo WHERE pecacodi = :pecacodi AND GRUPOCODI = :grupocodi
DELETE FROM VCE_DATCALCULO WHERE pecacodi = {0}

INSERT INTO VCE_DATCALCULO(pecacodi,GRUPOCODI,CRDCGFECMOD) SELECT {0},GRUPOCODI,TO_DATE('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') FROM PR_GRUPO WHERE CATECODI = 2 AND (GRUPOACTIVO ='S' OR GRUPOCODI IN (SELECT GRUPOCODI FROM VCE_HORA_OPERACION WHERE PECACODI = {0})) AND GRUPOCODI NOT IN (SELECT GRUPOCODI FROM VCE_GRUPO_EXCLUIDO WHERE PECACODI = {0}) UNION SELECT {0},GR.GRUPOCODIBASE,DAT.FECHADAT FROM PR_GRUPODAT DAT JOIN (SELECT GRUPOCODI,GRUPOCODI AS GRUPOCODIBASE FROM PR_GRUPO GH WHERE CATECODI = 2 AND (GRUPOACTIVO ='S' OR GRUPOCODI IN (SELECT GRUPOCODI FROM VCE_HORA_OPERACION WHERE PECACODI = {0})) UNION SELECT GP.GRUPOCODI,GH.GRUPOCODI AS GRUPOCODIBASE FROM PR_GRUPO GH JOIN PR_GRUPO GP ON GH.GRUPOPADRE = GP.GRUPOCODI WHERE GH.CATECODI = 2 AND (GH.GRUPOACTIVO ='S' OR GH.GRUPOCODI IN (SELECT GRUPOCODI FROM VCE_HORA_OPERACION WHERE PECACODI = {0})) UNION SELECT GA.GRUPOCODI,GH.GRUPOCODI AS GRUPOCODIBASE FROM PR_GRUPO GH JOIN PR_GRUPO GP ON GH.GRUPOPADRE = GP.GRUPOCODI JOIN PR_GRUPO GA ON GP.GRUPOPADRE = GA.GRUPOCODI WHERE GH.CATECODI = 2 AND (GH.GRUPOACTIVO ='S' OR GH.GRUPOCODI IN (SELECT GRUPOCODI FROM VCE_HORA_OPERACION WHERE PECACODI = {0})) ) GR ON DAT.GRUPOCODI = GR.GRUPOCODI AND FECHADAT > TO_DATE('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND FECHADAT < ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY'),1) AND DAT.CONCEPCODI IN (SELECT CONCEPCODI FROM VCE_CFGDATCALCULO WHERE CFGDCESTREGISTRO='1') AND DELETED=0 AND GR.GRUPOCODIBASE NOT IN (SELECT GRUPOCODI FROM VCE_GRUPO_EXCLUIDO WHERE PECACODI = {0})
SELECT DISTINCT FENERGCODI,NVL(CFGDCCONDSQL,'AND 1=1') AS CFGDCCONDSQL FROM VCE_CFGDATCALCULO ORDER BY 1,2
SELECT FENERGCODI, CONCEPCODI, CFGDCCAMPONOMB, CFGDCTIPOVAL, CFGDCCONDSQL, CFGDCESTREGISTRO FROM VCE_CFGDATCALCULO WHERE FENERGCODI = {0} AND NVL(CFGDCCONDSQL,'AND 1=1') = '{1}'

UPDATE VCE_DATCALCULO SET CRDCGNUMARRPAR = (SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN CRHOPCOMPORDARRQ='S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN CRHOPCOMPORDPARD='S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))/2 FROM VCE_HORA_OPERACION HOP WHERE VCE_DATCALCULO.pecacodi = HOP.pecacodi AND VCE_DATCALCULO.GRUPOCODI = HOP.GRUPOCODI) WHERE pecacodi = {0} AND TO_CHAR(CRDCGFECMOD,'DD')='01'

UPDATE VCE_DATCALCULO SET CRDCGCCPOTEFE = (VCE_COMPENSACION_PKG.FNC_OBTIENE_VAL_CONCEPTO(GRUPOCODI,14,CRDCGFECMOD,{1})*1000)/VCE_COMPENSACION_PKG.FNC_OBTIENE_VAL_CONCEPTO(GRUPOCODI,190,CRDCGFECMOD,{1}) WHERE pecacodi = {0} AND NVL(CRDCGPOTEFE,0) != 0 AND NVL(CRDCGCCPOTEFE,0) = 0 AND GRUPOCODI IN (SELECT GRUPOCODI FROM PR_GRUPO WHERE FENERGCODI = 3 AND CATECODI = 2 AND GRUPOACTIVO ='S')

SELECT TRIM(GR.GRUPONOMB) AS "Modo de Operación" , FE.FENERGNOMB AS "Fuente Energía" , DC.CRDCGTIPCOM AS "Combustible" , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(DC.CRDCGFECMOD,'DD')='01' THEN BA.BARRBARRATRANSFERENCIA ELSE TO_CHAR(DC.CRDCGFECMOD,'DD') END AS "BARRA / Día Per." , CASE DC.CRDCGCONSIDERAPOTNOM WHEN 1 THEN 'Si' END AS "Considerar Potencia Nominal" , DC.CRDCGLHV AS "LHV (KJ/m3) / (KJ/Kg)" , DC.CRDCGTRANSPOR AS "Transporte (S//gal)" , DC.CRDCGTRATMEC AS "Trat. Mecanico (S//gal)" , DC.CRDCGTRATQUIM AS "Trat. Quimico (S//gal)" , DC.CRDCGDIASFINANC AS "Dias costo financiero" , DC.CRDCGCVNCDOL AS "CVNC $/kWh" , DC.CRDCGCVNCSOL AS "CVNC S//KWh" , DC.CRDCGPRECOMB AS "Precio Combustible" , DC.CRDCGPRECOMBUNID AS "Precio Comb. (Unid)" , DC.CRDCGENERGIA AS "Energia MWh" , DC.CRDCGTIEMPO AS "Tiempo Hrs" , DC.CRDCGNUMARRPAR AS "N arr/par" , DC.CRDCGPOTEFE AS "Potencia Efectiva MW" , DC.CRDCGCCPOTEFE AS "Consumo Comb. Pot.Efe" , DC.CRDCGPOTPAR1 AS "Potencia parcial 1 MW" , DC.CRDCGCONCOMPP1 AS "Consumo Comb. Pot.Parcial 1" , DC.CRDCGPOTPAR2 AS "Potencia parcial 2 MW" , DC.CRDCGCONCOMPP2 AS "Consumo Comb. Pot.Parcial 2" , DC.CRDCGPOTPAR3 AS "Potencia parcial 3 MW" , DC.CRDCGCONCOMPP3 AS "Consumo Comb. Pot.Parcial 3" , DC.CRDCGPOTPAR4 AS "Potencia parcial 4 MW" , DC.CRDCGCONCOMPP4 AS "Consumo Comb. Pot.Parcial 4" , DC.CRDCGPOTMIN AS "Potencia Mínima MW" FROM VCE_DATCALCULO DC JOIN PR_GRUPO GR ON DC.GRUPOCODI = GR.GRUPOCODI LEFT JOIN SI_FUENTEENERGIA FE ON GR.FENERGCODI = FE.FENERGCODI LEFT JOIN TRN_BARRA BA ON DC.BARRCODI = BA.BARRCODI WHERE DC.pecacodi = {0} ORDER BY GR.GRUPONOMB, DC.CRDCGFECMOD

SELECT DISTINCT APGDETFECINIPER, TO_CHAR(APGDETFECINIPER,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS FECHADMY, TO_CHAR(APGDETFECINIPER,'DD') AS DIA, TO_CHAR(APGDETFECINIPER,'DD-MON') AS TITULO FROM VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_DET WHERE pecacodi = {0} ORDER BY APGDETFECINIPER

SELECT * FROM VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_CFGCAB WHERE APGCFCCODI IN (SELECT APGCFCCODI FROM VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_CFGDET WHERE APGCFDFECALTA <= TO_DATE('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND (APGCFDFECBAJA IS NULL OR APGCFDFECBAJA > TO_DATE('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY')) ) ORDER BY APGCFCORDEN

SELECT PECATIPOCAMBIO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PERIANIOMES,'YYYYMM'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS FECHAINI, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(PERIANIOMES,'YYYYMM'),1), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS FECHAFIN FROM TRN_PERIODO PE JOIN VCE_PERIODO_CALCULO PC ON PE.PERICODI = PC.PERICODI WHERE pecacodi = {0}

select crdcgcmarr_dol, crdcgcmarr_sol, crdcgccbefparrampa, crdcgccbefpar, crdcgccbefarrtoma, crdcgccbefarr, crdcgpotmin, crdcgconcompp4, crdcgpotpar4, crdcgconcompp3, crdcgpotpar3, crdcgconcompp2, crdcgpotpar2, crdcgconcompp1, crdcgpotpar1, crdcgccpotefe, crdcgpotefe, crdcgnumarrpar, crdcgprecioaplicunid, crdcgprecioaplic, crdcgprecombunid, crdcgprecomb, crdcgcvncsol, crdcgcvncdol, crdcgtratquim, crdcgtratmec, crdcgtranspor, crdcglhv, crdcgtipcom, crdcgfecmod, grupocodi, pecacodi, crdcgdiasfinanc, crdcgtiempo, crdcgenergia, crdcgconsiderapotnom, barrcodi, crdcgconspotefearr, crdcgconspotefepar, crdcgprecioaplicxarr, crdcgprecioaplicxpar, crdcgprecioaplicxincgen, crdcgprecioaplicxdisgen from vce_datcalculo where pecacodi = {0}

select crdcgcmarr_dol, crdcgcmarr_sol, crdcgccbefparrampa, crdcgccbefpar, crdcgccbefarrtoma, crdcgccbefarr, crdcgpotmin, crdcgconcompp4, crdcgpotpar4, crdcgconcompp3, crdcgpotpar3, crdcgconcompp2, crdcgpotpar2, crdcgconcompp1, crdcgpotpar1, crdcgccpotefe, crdcgpotefe, crdcgnumarrpar, crdcgprecioaplicunid, crdcgprecioaplic, crdcgprecombunid, crdcgprecomb, crdcgcvncsol, crdcgcvncdol, crdcgtratquim, crdcgtratmec, crdcgtranspor, crdcglhv, crdcgtipcom, crdcgfecmod, grupocodi, pecacodi, crdcgdiasfinanc, crdcgtiempo, crdcgenergia, crdcgconsiderapotnom, barrcodi, crdcgconspotefearr, crdcgconspotefepar, crdcgprecioaplicxarr, crdcgprecioaplicxpar, crdcgprecioaplicxincgen, crdcgprecioaplicxdisgen from vce_datcalculo where pecacodi = {0} and nvl(crdcgpotefe, 0) != 0 and nvl(crdcgccpotefe, 0) = 0 and grupocodi in (select grupocodi from pr_grupo where fenergcodi = 3 and catecodi = 2 )
select distinct crdcgfecmod from vce_datcalculo where pecacodi = {0} order by 1

select distinct crdcgfecmod from vce_datcalculo where pecacodi = {0} and nvl(crdcgpotefe,0) != 0 and nvl(crdcgccpotefe,0) = 0 and grupocodi in (select grupocodi from pr_grupo where fenergcodi = 3 and catecodi = 2 ) order by 1
select distinct grupocodi from vce_datcalculo where pecacodi = {0} {1} order by 1

select distinct grupocodi from vce_datcalculo where pecacodi = {0} and nvl(crdcgpotefe, 0) != 0 and nvl(crdcgccpotefe, 0) = 0 and grupocodi in (select grupocodi from pr_grupo where fenergcodi = 3 and catecodi = 2 ) order by 1

update vce_datcalculo set crdcgtipcom = (select dat.formuladat from pr_grupodat dat , pr_concepto cnp , (select grupocodi , gruponomb , catecodi , gh.grupocodi as grupocodi_base from pr_grupo gh where gh.catecodi = 2 union select gp.grupocodi , gp.gruponomb , gp.catecodi , gh.grupocodi as grupocodi_base from pr_grupo gh join pr_grupo gp on gh.grupopadre = gp.grupocodi where gh.catecodi = 2 union select ga.grupocodi , ga.gruponomb , ga.catecodi , gh.grupocodi as grupocodi_base from pr_grupo gh join pr_grupo gp on gh.grupopadre = gp.grupocodi join pr_grupo ga on gp.grupopadre = ga.grupocodi where gh.catecodi = 2 ) gr , (select grupocodi , concepcodi , max(fechadat) as fechamax from pr_grupodat where deleted = 0 and concepcodi = 146 and fechadat <= to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') group by grupocodi, concepcodi) vi where dat.deleted = 0 and dat.grupocodi = vi.grupocodi and dat.concepcodi = vi.concepcodi and dat.fechadat = vi.fechamax and cnp.concepcodi = dat.concepcodi and gr.grupocodi = vi.grupocodi and vce_datcalculo.grupocodi = dat.grupocodi ) where pecacodi = {0} and crdcgfecmod = to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY')

SELECT R1.GRUPOCODI ,R1.APGCFCCODI ,TO_CHAR(R1.APGDETFECINIPER,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS APGDETFECINIPER ,NVL(TO_CHAR(R2.APGDETFECINIPER,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'{0}') AS APGDETFECFINPER FROM (SELECT ROWNUM SEC,T.* FROM (SELECT GRUPOCODI,APGCFCCODI,APGDETFECINIPER FROM VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_DET WHERE pecacodi = {1} ORDER BY GRUPOCODI,APGCFCCODI,APGDETFECINIPER) T) R1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT ROWNUM SEC,T.* FROM (SELECT GRUPOCODI,APGCFCCODI,APGDETFECINIPER FROM VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_DET WHERE pecacodi = {1} ORDER BY GRUPOCODI,APGCFCCODI,APGDETFECINIPER) T) R2 ON R1.GRUPOCODI = R2.GRUPOCODI AND R1.APGCFCCODI = R2.APGCFCCODI AND (R1.SEC + 1) = R2.SEC WHERE R1.GRUPOCODI IN (SELECT GRUPOCODI FROM VCE_HORA_OPERACION WHERE pecacodi = {1}) ORDER BY 1,2,3

INSERT INTO VCE_DATCALCULO ( PECACODI, GRUPOCODI, CRDCGFECMOD, CRDCGTIPCOM, CRDCGLHV, CRDCGTRANSPOR, CRDCGTRATMEC, CRDCGTRATQUIM, CRDCGCVNCDOL, CRDCGCVNCSOL, CRDCGPRECOMB, CRDCGPRECOMBUNID, CRDCGPRECIOAPLIC, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICUNID, CRDCGNUMARRPAR, CRDCGPOTEFE, CRDCGCCPOTEFE, CRDCGPOTPAR1, CRDCGCONCOMPP1, CRDCGPOTPAR2, CRDCGCONCOMPP2, CRDCGPOTPAR3, CRDCGCONCOMPP3, CRDCGPOTPAR4, CRDCGCONCOMPP4, CRDCGPOTMIN, CRDCGCCBEFARR, CRDCGCCBEFARRTOMA, CRDCGCCBEFPAR, CRDCGCCBEFPARRAMPA, CRDCGCMARR_SOL, CRDCGCMARR_DOL, BARRCODI, CRDCGCONSIDERAPOTNOM, CRDCGENERGIA, CRDCGTIEMPO, CRDCGDIASFINANC, CRDCGCONSPOTEFEARR, CRDCGCONSPOTEFEPAR, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICXARR, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICXPAR, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICXINCGEN, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICXDISGEN ) SELECT {0}, GRUPOCODI, CRDCGFECMOD, CRDCGTIPCOM, CRDCGLHV, CRDCGTRANSPOR, CRDCGTRATMEC, CRDCGTRATQUIM, CRDCGCVNCDOL, CRDCGCVNCSOL, CRDCGPRECOMB, CRDCGPRECOMBUNID, CRDCGPRECIOAPLIC, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICUNID, CRDCGNUMARRPAR, CRDCGPOTEFE, CRDCGCCPOTEFE, CRDCGPOTPAR1, CRDCGCONCOMPP1, CRDCGPOTPAR2, CRDCGCONCOMPP2, CRDCGPOTPAR3, CRDCGCONCOMPP3, CRDCGPOTPAR4, CRDCGCONCOMPP4, CRDCGPOTMIN, CRDCGCCBEFARR, CRDCGCCBEFARRTOMA, CRDCGCCBEFPAR, CRDCGCCBEFPARRAMPA, CRDCGCMARR_SOL, CRDCGCMARR_DOL, BARRCODI, CRDCGCONSIDERAPOTNOM, CRDCGENERGIA, CRDCGTIEMPO, CRDCGDIASFINANC, CRDCGCONSPOTEFEARR, CRDCGCONSPOTEFEPAR, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICXARR, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICXPAR, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICXINCGEN, CRDCGPRECIOAPLICXDISGEN FROM VCE_DATCALCULO WHERE PECACODI = {1}
